metadata.title: Muhammad Ahmed Shehzad - Backend Developer & Full Stack Engineer
metadata.description: Backend Developer specialising in C#, .NET, TypeScript, and scalable server-side architectures. Proficient in full-stack development with React, Next.js, and modern web technologies.
metadata.keywords: Backend Developer, Full Stack Engineer, C#, .NET, TypeScript, React, Next.js, Server-side Development, API Development, Web Developer, Software Engineer, Database Architecture
metadata.author: Muhammad Ahmed Shehzad

hero.name: Muhammad Ahmed Shehzad
hero.description: I am a Full Stack Developer with a passion for building web applications and services.

about.title: My Journey as a Developer
about.description: From curiosity to expertise - discover what drives my passion for building exceptional digital experiences.

personalIntroduction.title: Backend Developer & Full Stack Technology Enthusiast
personalIntroduction.intro: I'm Muhammad Ahmed Shehzad, a Backend Developer specialising in building scalable, performance-driven server-side applications and robust system architectures. Whilst my core expertise lies in backend development, I maintain proficiency across the full stack — enabling me to deliver comprehensive solutions with clean architecture, maintainability, and measurable business impact.

journey.title: The Journey That Shaped Me
journey.description: My journey in tech started when I built my first interactive web page as a teenager, fascinated by how a few lines of code could bring ideas to life. Over the years, I've transformed that curiosity into a professional skill set — delivering solutions for startups, enterprises, and everything in between.

drives.title: What Drives Me Today
drives.description: I believe great software isn't just about functionality — it's about creating experiences that users love and businesses can rely on. Whether it's optimising performance, implementing robust architecture, or crafting intuitive interfaces, I approach every project with the same passion that got me started: the excitement of solving complex problems through elegant code.

expertise.title: My Core Expertise & Approach
expertise.description1: As a Backend Developer at heart, my true expertise lies in architecting robust server-side solutions, designing scalable APIs, and building reliable data architectures. Whilst I'm proficient with frontend technologies like React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS — they're tools I can work with effectively rather than my primary specialisation.
expertise.description2: I'm passionate about leveraging AI Assistant Programming as a powerful pair programming partner. Using tools like GitHub Copilot and AWS CodeWhisperer, I combine AI efficiency with solid engineering principles — accelerating development whilst maintaining code quality and architectural integrity. Rather than relying on "vibe coding," I use these AI tools with deep understanding and intentionality.

coreValues.title: Core Values
coreValues.description: The principles that drive my approach to development and collaboration.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.description: Here are some of my recent projects that showcase my skills in creating high-quality, user-friendly web applications.

0.name: Alex Thompson
0.text: Ahmed's attention to detail and problem-solving skills are exceptional. He delivered our project ahead of schedule and exceeded all expectations.

1.name: Maria Rodriguez
1.text: Working with Ahmed was a pleasure. His ability to translate design concepts into pixel-perfect, responsive interfaces is truly impressive.

2.name: James Chen
2.text: Ahmed brought both technical expertise and strategic thinking to our team. His solutions are not just functional but also scalable and maintainable.

3.name: Fatima Rahman
3.text: Ahmed's communication skills are as impressive as his technical abilities. He kept our entire team informed throughout the development process.

4.name: David Kim
4.text: The quality of Ahmed's work speaks for itself. Clean, well-documented code that our entire team could easily understand and build upon.

contact.title: Let's create something amazing together
contact.description: Ready to bring your project to life? Let's connect and discuss how I can help you to achieve your goals.

footer.copyright: © 2024 Muhammad Ahmed Shehzad. All rights reserved.

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: I'm a software developer with over 5 years of experience building web applications. I enjoy working on both frontend and backend development, and I'm passionate about writing clean, maintainable code. I've worked with various technologies and love learning new ones to solve interesting problems.

responsibilities.0: Develop and maintain a platform that connects people needing care with local healthcare providers
responsibilities.1: Built a CRM system used daily by our consultant team to manage client relationships and track progress
responsibilities.2: Created an automated calling system using Twilio API that helps our team reach clients more efficiently

responsibilities.0: Built an employee engagement platform focused on learning and development for corporate clients
responsibilities.1: Added gamification features like challenges and knowledge-sharing to make learning more engaging
responsibilities.2: Worked on reward systems that encouraged employees to participate more actively in company programs

responsibilities.0: Worked on a Lidar Management System for RWE, handling large amounts of wind energy sensor data
responsibilities.1: Built several REST APIs using .NET and C# for data processing and management
responsibilities.2: Developed React frontend applications with focus on performance and user experience
responsibilities.3: Optimized system performance by improving API design and database queries

responsibilities.0: Created a heating oil price calculator that customers use to get accurate pricing quotes
responsibilities.1: Built an online ordering system that streamlined the customer purchase process
responsibilities.2: Developed logistics tools to help the company manage their delivery fleet and reduce costs

responsibilities.0: Developed Digital Signage applications using .NET and C# for content management and display
responsibilities.1: Implemented real-time communication using SignalR for live content updates across displays
responsibilities.2: Created custom controls in CMS for managing digital signage applications deployed at banks, restaurants, and billboards
responsibilities.3: Collaborated with clients to customize digital displays according to their branding and content requirements

responsibilities.0: Worked on live sports score features for 365Scores, a popular sports app
responsibilities.1: Built personalized content feeds showing users their favorite teams and players
responsibilities.2: Created tools for content publishers to integrate our sports data into their platforms

education.title: Education
education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

content.opening: I am writing to express my strong interest in the {positionName} position at {companyName}. With over 5 years of professional experience in backend development and full-stack engineering, I am excited about the opportunity to contribute to your team and help drive innovative solutions.
content.experience1: Throughout my career, I have specialized in building robust, scalable applications using C#, .NET, and modern web technologies. Currently at Verbund Pflegehilfe, I develop and maintain a healthcare platform connecting patients with local providers, built a comprehensive CRM system, and created an automated calling system using Twilio API. Previously at Sustayn GmbH, I built an employee engagement platform with gamification features and reward systems that significantly increased user participation in corporate learning programs.
content.experience2: My experience spans diverse industries and challenging technical projects. At FPT Software, I worked on a Lidar Management System for RWE, processing large volumes of wind energy sensor data and building high-performance REST APIs. During my time at SODEFA GmbH, I created customer-facing tools including a heating oil price calculator and logistics management system that streamlined operations and provided realtime transparency. Earlier in my career at Cybersoft North America, I developed Digital Signage applications with real-time content updates using SignalR, deployed across banks and restaurants.
content.technical: My technical skillset encompasses both backend and frontend development, with proficiency in TypeScript, React, and modern development practices including Clean Architecture, Domain-Driven Design, and CQRS patterns. At Six Logics, I contributed to 365Scores, a popular sports app, building live score features and personalized content feeds. I am particularly passionate about writing maintainable, testable code and implementing solutions that scale effectively as businesses grow.
content.unique: What sets me apart is my commitment to continuous learning and proven track record across multiple industries. From healthcare platforms and employee engagement systems to wind energy data management, digital signage applications, logistics tools, and sports data platforms, I have successfully delivered solutions in diverse domains. This breadth of experience has given me a unique perspective on software engineering challenges and the adaptability to quickly understand new business requirements and deliver effective solutions.
content.interest: I am particularly drawn to {companyName} because of

content.value: . I believe my experience in building user-focused applications, combined with my strong technical foundation and collaborative approach, would make me a valuable addition to your team.

content.name: Muhammad Ahmed Shehzad
